item.title: DMC Global Inc 10-K
item.description: DMC Global Inc, which is in the Miscellaneous Primary Metal Products [3390] industry, SEC 10-K filing on February 27, 2023 had 35402 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: financial - 258 instances arcadia - 248 instances december - 245 instances company - 233 instances 2022 - 227 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
